extensionDescription.message: This extension prevents users to close the tab where a movie or serie is being loaded from Cuevana.tv site.

popMessage.message: You are closing the window, you may lose the serie/movie. Are you sure??

optionspage_p1.message: There is no options at this time, it's just a pop up :)
